title: Family Emergency Plan: Your Safety Blueprint
description: Learn how to create a comprehensive family emergency plan to ensure safety and preparedness during disasters.

sections.title: Before an Emergency
sections.content:
## Risk Planning

- Identify hazards that could happen in your area and plan for unique actions for each.
- Work with local emergency management to understand local plans and recommendations.

## Needs of Specific Family Members

- Create networks of neighbors, relatives, and friends to assist each other in emergencies.
- Discuss needs and responsibilities, including care for children, pets, and those with specific needs.

## Plan for Locations

- Have plans and supplies for locations you and your household frequent.
- Customize personal and household plans based on potential emergencies at these locations.

sections.title: During an Emergency
sections.content:
## Communication Plan

- Ensure all family members know how to contact each other during an emergency.
- Designate a safe meeting place if separated.

## Immediate Actions

- Follow local emergency management instructions.
- Use your emergency supplies and stay informed through local news and alerts.

sections.title: After an Emergency
sections.content:
## Recovery Steps

- Assess the safety of your home before re-entering.
- Communicate with family members to ensure everyone's safety.
- Follow local guidance for recovery and rebuilding efforts.
